content.detailedDescription:
Before i begin, i want to clarify that the time given for this event, is the exact time i noticed these objects/lights. i can't say that's when they first showed up. the duration is approximate, as i can't say when they actually shifted out of view; though i'm certain they were still in the sky. i was inside my apartment, when i saw them, and not in the position to go outside. i don't understand the "also in area" question; and am not good at determining spatial/relational measured distance - or conversion of size.

here's the event, as it happened. i have been recording these events for myself, since i first noticed them. i thought these were government surveillance drones, but now i don't know what to think. the cops and local newspaper don't seem to know what they are, or care about it - and no one is investigating this. i find that incredibly ridiculous and odd. here's my report for this particular incident (i have written documentation of several of these incidents, but could not list it as additional evidence, below. the box isn't working. i chose to report the incident with the most detail. to get the full picture/all the details i have, please contact me):

i was in my apartment (i'm on the 4th floor of a high-rise, which faces a north-easterly direction). i was just looking out, as i do sometimes. it was 7:30 pm, and i noticed 2 of these craft, in the skies. i noticed them, because they stood out against the dark sky, and were flashing; these vivid, bright white lights, with equally vivid flashing red and blue lights (on top). they presented as a cluster of lights. i didn't know what they were, because i'd never seen anything like that before. anywhere. but i've been here for years, and not seen them, ever. planes go over in this area, from time to time. usually to land (there's a beacon somewhere nw of us. so i know what those look and sound like. these were too bright, had the wrong color set, and didn't seem to have a destination. they were up there, and moving some, but otherwise, just hovering. and they were totally silent. i heard nothing, which i also thought odd. so i stared at them awhile, and checked back for them, later. i ran through the possibilities: they were definitely not planes, black hawks (several have flown over this high-rise, since i've been here) - or any other helicopter, jets or balloons or blimps, or any of that. then what was it? my mind went to the times we're in, and i settled on some recent tactic of government surveillance. the nsa's unconstitutional nosiness, was no longer a secret, after all: they must be drones. it was, relatively, the simplest explanation - so i went with that, initially.

the one was flying ne to sw, in commercial airspace (far as i could tell, it was). it had what i can only describe as a plasmic-looking light, which flashed at 1-second intervals; and when it flashed, it obscured my view of the object, a bit. when not flashing, i could see a faint shadowy object against the sky. it was a dark silhouette, visible even against the dark night sky. i must say, i was surprised at its apparent size. it was much larger than i expected, based on the lights i had seen, alone. it was not a simple geometric form, either - it looked complex; large, bulky, and irregular in its outline. i've never seen a craft like it, except in movies or sci-fi tv. not that anything in particular comes to mind - but it didn't look like anything known to the public, as ours. i'll put it that way. i was stunned and taken aback by it, but eventually brushed it off as not surprising. the government's gloves have been coming off, regarding all the things they've been doing to accomplish their ends, lately (with regard to the constitution, privacy, etc.). they have officially lost their minds, out loud - is what i ended up concluding. i couldn't explain the size of this particular "drone"; it was on a larger scale of aircraft. so i actually didn't know what to think, then - but found myself migrating back to the drone explanation, anyway. that's not like me, truthfully...But i did. the flashing light on this one was white. though while it was still in the ne part of the sky (and at a slightly different angle) i could see its red and blue flashing lights.

the other one sat in the ne sky, definitely in commercial airspace, at about the height of a descending plane. sort of - maybe a bit higher. only it was too distant for me to make out the actual form of the craft; due to either distance, or the flashing lights - i can never tell what the actual craft looks like. the craft i described in the first paragraph, was the exception. anyway - this one moved or shifted at a moderate speed, up or diagonal or the like, occasionally. its movements were too agile and quick, for a plane or helicopter - but not so much so, as to be overly impressive, or warrant exclusion from a mundane explanation. these things generally move at a fluid, steady, even leisurely pace. anyway, it moved a bit, as though to position itself - but remained in that same area, in the ne sky. i thought for a moment, i might have also seen some green in the lights at points (on that one), but i’m real iffy on that; i wasn't able to confirm it for myself. if there was green, though - that would be a first. soon, i noticed 2 more; and they were approaching the same position as the others were/are in (taking into account, their shift of position). this was the most i’d seen at once, thus far. the i saw 3 more. and another. all of them coming from the ne sky; albeit, along a semi-broad belt of it, altogether. then two more, and two more. that’s 12, and counting. it was now 9:15 pm. around 10 pm, when checking the skies outside my window - the crafts had rotated east, out of view. i say rotate, because they were clearly taking a massive grid-like position - spreading out to what was apparently, their posts. i watched the one stationed in my section of sky, shift to get in position, stay awhile, then shift in an eastern direction. eventually, it was no longer in view.

the whole time, i just stared in wonder. and afterward, i was just confounded. curious, fascinated. i had my best guesses - but what were these things? who did they belong to, and why were they there? what does this mean for us...And how does it fit into all that's been happening? whatever they were, and whoever was behind them - they've been functioning outright, like a sophisticated system of surveillance; and, at minimum, on a city-wide scale. logic begs the unlikelihood that this is strictly a myopic operation; and even if it is - how long before that is no longer true? why does no one seem to know what these things are? why don't they seem to care? why haven't i heard any buzz about such blatant and suspect activity in our skies? this is an obvious security concern, and breach of privacy - as well as a legal matter. i felt like i was in some twilight zone. invasive surveillance - initially behind our backs, and now in our face - via virtually all of our communication devices, in most of our homes...And now in our skies? has it really come to this? and already? then i felt a heaviness of dread and sorrow. i guess mostly because, like many of us - i’d known about the darkness hiding in plain sight, for a long time; germinated and in bloom - the finale and aftermath, still to come. not just because of the emboldened draining of our liberties - but because of the motivations behind it; and the mounting implications of what that means for our future. drones or no - these were haunting whispers of an evil history, repeating. and this is only one aspect of corruption and injustice, that is in the process of raining its toxic fruit upon the human race... i also grieved the fact that most of us are still utterly unprepared (not that one could ever be fully prepared)...And still gravely underestimate what's already here & happening, as well as what's coming. we are in for a world of hurt. we are only at the mouth of it, now. and there will be no mercy for pet illusions or delusions - no matter how sophisticated, traditional, or sincere. it will be jarring and messy; full of harsh realizations and piercing truths, and pain and suffering. things will get worse, before they get better. much worse. because the crooked and backward paradigms, which now stand - have been long and complex, in their development; and our momentum on this corrupted path, has increased to the point of being vigorously self-sustaining. we will feel, keenly, the full force of the moment of inertia. it will threaten to overwhelm us, as we turn to change direction. our transformation will come neither quickly, nor easily; but if the human race doesn't choose it - we will enter a long and crushing era of night. the likes of which we have never seen. yet, if we do choose to come into the fullness of who we are - and it must be a commitment of all, or nothing - then it will require sobriety, conscious and fearless thought, an iron will, and substantial healing, in order to achieve it. it will also require a maturation unto wisdom and balance; a willingness to shift into a brand new direction of thought & life...If that transformation is to take permanence. we must see our insanity... and each other - step back, and expand our conscious imagination. then our work will be cut out for us; and we will be trail-blazing, the entire way - setting a safe foundation worthy of pride, for the legacy we leave behind. we are at the crossroads, and fast approaching its center. either way we turn, will be excruciating. either way, there will be death. but upward metamorphosis, is the only path that will be worth it; for in its wake, we will experience the birth of a better world. one that is healthy, hospitable, and sustainable. that's the difference. what will happen to us? only we can answer that. whichever way it goes - we won't have long now, to find out. this was my thought stream, from beginning to end. then i came back to the present, and slowly resumed my evening. doing what, i couldn't say - for this body of thought, consumed me. it still does.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craft, typically visible as a cluster of lights: takes the appearance of a very large/close, bright white star, with red & blue flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving into the town of blue diamond, nv (about ten miles out of las vegas, near red rock canyon) when i spotted this very bright, pulsating red-orange light in the sky. the object was just under the clouds. it was hovering in place, for a moment, then lowered down, and back up again. suddenly a fainter, white light appeared to come out of it and the white light flew off rapidly. much faster than any plane or helicopter could have. after the white light took off (couldn't get the white light in the video due to my distance) the red-orange object hovered for another minute then disappeared in the blink of an eye. 

from where i took this video, the object was about 30-40 miles away.
i know the area very well and know, for sure, this wasn't a plane, a helicopter, or some man-made light. it was a moving/hovering extremely bright object that shot out a projectile of some sort (another ship?) and quickly disappeared into the night.
content.summary: Bright ufo over las vegas on december 5, 2014

content.detailedDescription:
I walked on to my back porch that has a very far reaching few towards 35 and past. for a cigarette. there are towers with red flashing lights in my view that i've seen hundreds of times. i've lived next to air force bases and never heard anything like this. i hear the very loud blades of at least one helicopter in the air but i don't see any of their tell-tale flashing lights. i don't think much of it even though it is rather loud. 

then i hear short burts of loud humming/shooting. the only thing i've heard like it are youtube videos of a-10 gunfire but quieter. helicopters and short bursts of this noise repeat for a few minutes. as i'm looking into the air trying to find the source of the sound i notice there are "plane trails" in "c" shapes in the sky in front of me. a few minutes like this pass. then a large cluster of lights appear with a flash and immediately descend at a fast speed. the bursts have stopped but i can still hear the helicopters as i type this. i'm a skeptic. i laugh at ancient aliens, david icke and conspiracy theories. this confused me.
content.summary: Heard what sounded like loud helicopters and short bursts of loud shooting/humming noises. far off in the distance a cluster of lights  (it was hard to tell the exact shape) flashed/pulsated and then descended very quickly, like it had been shot down.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: i crash landed my rc toy to film on my iphone as it flew over head from south to north and then went east out of site. it moved very slow and seemed to hover as if it knew we were watching. then flew away. zero noise. i thought i might be the space station by some weird chance. but i looked up where the station was and it wasn't due for another 4 days!
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was flying a cheap quadcopter in the back parking lot at about 200 ft with my ex-army ranger buddy when we saw it,

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
At about 6:15 pm, december 5th 2014, i was driving along the memorial bridge that connects lewiston to auburn, heading towards the gym in auburn. seeing what i thought were stars the whole time. there were seven to ten fireballs in the sky, in an arc with the last few in a kind of line. as i approached the light, i noticed what they were. or specifically what they weren't.

i noticed them moving side to side, and in and out. they were under the cloud cover, there were no stars, and no planes. there was no blinking lights. at this point several of them broke off towards walmart and out of sight. the last three formed a triangle, as i pulled into the marriott hotel and ran around the building to see the last three in the triangle begin to move closer and slowly fade out one by one.

i'd been texting my wife, after unsuccessfully calling her twice. at this point i got in my truck and drove to the gym. i also called the mufon office at this point.  after about ten minutes i got out of my truck and spotted two of the ones that had broken off from the triangle group. at this point i was able to take two pictures and a short video of them fading away slowly. 

i'm using a different device to file this report, if you can contact me and get it arranged so i can email the 'evidence'. thanks so much.
content.summary: I was driving saw seven or more ufos in an arc. several of them broke into a group and headed out of sight. the last three formed a triangle, before i parked, and slowly faded out one by one. about ten minutes later i saw two of the group that broke o

content.detailedDescription: We were staying at my wife's mom and dad's place. we were staying in our fifth wheel travel trailer. at about 9:20 i took our dog out to use the restroom. the night was clear and warm i was looking at the mountain range that is not very far from where we were staying. after the dog finished his business i picked him up and was walking back to the trailer. there was 3 very very bright flashes of light. i'm taking like they were as bright as welding  flashes.  i was walking to the west i turned my head over my left shoulder and seen a ship that was huge just sitting there. it was triangular shape with lights running down the middle of it. the lights were white and i could see the shape very clearly. i stood there for a bit just looking at it. all of a sudden i took off running towards the trailer i was probably about 15 feet from the door i jerked the door opened and told my wife come here and look at this. she was getting up when i looked back up over my right shoulder and it was gone. i stepped away from the trailer and started looking for it.I looked all over and it was not there.I never heard a noise or anything. i told my wife what i saw.I still don't know how anything that big could have disappeared that fast. i didn't sleep very well that night. i asked my father in law if they had ever seen anything weird before and he surprised me and said yes. i told him what i saw and he said they have never seen anything like that but they had seen other things.  for some reason he still will not talk about what they have seen.
content.summary: Saw 3 bright flashes of light looked over left shoulder seen craft larger than a football field turned and ran to door to tell wife looked back it was gone

content.detailedDescription: On 12/4/2014 10:05pm i first noticed one item in the sky at about a 45 degree angle above the roof of the building across from me and my family. the object was changing colors from red, white, blue, green, and to purple. there were clouds below the item, you could see the item clearly. approximately 10:15pm we noticed another in the sky to the left of it, then about 10:25pm, there were 2 more to the west of it to form a square then about 10:30pm the clouds began to move at a rapid pace to cover the 4 items by 10:35 all covered by clouds. at about 11 pm, the object moved from a 45 degree angle to approximately a 60 degree angle from the roof of the building across from us. on halloween night 10/31/2014 we were in lehigh acres at a friends house and we were facing east as well at about 10pm we noticed a similar object that was moving around the sky going up, down, left, and right, at a rapid pace. then about 10:30 it went from the northern part of the sky to the southern part of the sky it covered many miles in a split second. 4 days later 11/4/2014 as i was driving home from work at about 10:30 am i was pulled over by a black suv. a man walked up to my car dressed in a black suit with black sunglasses and talked to me his voice sounded like he was talking through a voice modifier. he knew my name and my information and he told me that the object i saw on halloween night, that i never saw it and that i need to forget what i saw and not to tell anyone.
content.summary: 12/4/2014 10:05 first noticed one item in the sky at about a 45 degree angle above the roof of the building accross from us. the object was changing colors from red,white, blue,green,to purple there were clouds below item you could see the item clearly

content.detailedDescription: My father and i were on our way home after a days fishing at blythe situated on the north east coast.We were heading toward whitely bay caravan park at around roughly 21.00 in september 2012.I was driving my car with my father the passenger as we were talking my father said to me it looks like theres some sort of comotion going on over in those trees in that field.As i looked i could see bright white lights coming from behind the trees which were at ground level.My dad was looking and said you think they were searching for something or someone.As we approached the caravan sight i remember looking ahead with my father saying what is that that has just came from those trees?I said its an aeroplane but do you realise it is not moving.My dad said its very low looks like its coming down and that something must have happened.I noticed lights in my rear view mirror and a car was behind me as i was driving about ten mph i let the car overtake me but cant remember it actaually passing us.I wanted to stop for a better look with my dad saying you dont want to be stopping here it could be a bad idea.The craft moved on as we approached a left hand bend in the road which leads to st.Mary's island a light house which is a local beauty spot. the craft moved toward the coast passing over trees at approximately 5-10 mph. the craft looked as though it was going to speed up and be out of our sight before we got to the next bend leading to the light house and along the links which takes you along the sea front.My father kept saying thats no aeroplane what im seeiing.Continueing to tell me as we rounded the right hand bend we were both in disbelief as the aircraft was stationary over the main road as though it had landed but at the same time looked to be hovering.The front of the craft pointed out to sea and the tail toward a row of houses and a cemetry,i wanted to stop eager to know but at the same time feeling afraid just what we were seeing.To me i saw an aeroplane with a row of bright blue and white lights along the full length of each wing flashing in a sequence out to sea although it was signaling to something or some one.My dad was panicking for me to carry on driving as we passed right beneath the craft itself. i noticed a stair way and an open door but could not make out any landing gear or the rest of the craft.As we carried on i said to my father where is this girl going walking toward the craft in the middle of the road i could not make her out as she seemed to be a dark silouette.I carried on driving off and mounted a kerb which seemed to bring me back to reality the area itself had an eerie silence with no one around during the whole event.I remember thinking how can no one see that or how come no one else has arrived on the scene and where did that girl go to?Also the car that over took me was no where to be seen either.I continued driving home both me and my father speculating what we saw or if anything would be on the news thinkink that the plane had come under terrorist attack or had been forced to land. we told of our event when we arrived home to family members and also watched the local news awaiting some sort of news flash but this never happened.I saw an aeroplane with blue and white markings and blue and white brilliant lights,my dad continues to say he saw the craft s missile come rocket like,like something out of flash gordon. i have seen the same object on a second occasion in exactly the same area which has my mind totally blown away.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Coming home from days fishing observed stationary aeroplane ahead.Very low altitude with no sound

content.detailedDescription: Taking picture of kids sledding. after when looking at photos noticed lights above photo. not sure what it is.
content.summary: Flying in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my night class from the kansas university edwards campus when while still in the parking lot (driving about to leave) i noticed a bright light above, to the left of me. i stopped the car thinking it was a helicopter, wanting to get a better look at the object i sit in the car and observe for a moment. it became apparent that this was not a helicopter- the bright light was becoming increasingly brighter and was stationary- not moving like a helicopter does. it is hard to describe the color, but it most resembled a fireball, the light brightened as object appeared to be moving towards me. then something really explainable happened- a smaller less bright orb just suddenly appeared underneath the larger orb and began moving, ever so slightly (back in forth, left to right)- but barely moving. i watched this for about a minute before the lights slowly dimmed out and i could no longer see the objects. i drove away trying to make sense of what i just saw...About 30 seconds after driving away i make a u-turn and return to the spot i saw the lights in hopes that they might be there- they weren't though. very strange. this is the second time i have seen two orbs together, the other time involved 2 orbs that looks exactly alike and moved together- almost dancing with each other. this was at a music festival in the summer of 2011 called kanrocksas- other people at the show marveled at these lights too.
content.summary: Two bright orbs, one larger above and smaller below

content.detailedDescription:
the following event occurred in culebra, puerto rico. in the large bay called enseanada honda, within it is a sub-bay called fulladoza bay. i was on a hill on the southwest side looking to the northeast. 

     im a photographer and was shooting an american kestrel while the bird was hunting from a telephone pole. its a fairly small bird, so even with a 300mm zoom lense, the falcon is pretty small. the falcon let me get within 40 feet where i was limited by a fence, so i kept shooting. the camera i have is an old nikon d70s, but it does shoot quality photos. the falcon isnt moving, but her head is looking around for a kill. when that falcon takes off is the shot that im looking for, u know, wings spread in a dramatic fashion. in order to do this, the camera remains in focus and basically all i have to do is hold the button while the camera is blowing out shots like almost 3 per second. if u want a great shot, thats how u get it,now u know.

     i was pretty unhappy with the results because i knew i didnt get a great shot, but i went on to review my photos as the bird had already left. also, i should mention there were no clouds at this particular time of day, which also makes for a rather boring photo. 

     long story short, as was reviewing the shots, of which i took about 200 in a matter of 3 minutes from 2:42 pm - 2:45pm, i noticed an image appear and disappear within 14 frames in basically the same location. 

     from my standing point and according to the photo, the object appears to be hovering over the middle of ensenada honda. right in the middle of the bay. 

     i should point out we do have an small aircraft airport which has flights leaving quite frequently, approx every 45 minutes.

     it is my opinion that this was not a plane, nor a helicopter, nor a bug. but look at the images yourself and decide. to me, as a photographer, this is an ufo hovering and disappearing in the same spot in the middle of an busy area.

     i am including the 14 images that show the object. u should look at image 170 and image 181. or photo 2 with photo 5 the cropped of that image.Photo 7 with photo 10 the cropped of that image. notice the head movement of the hawk as well as the time stamp on the properties of the copyrighted photos. and remember this is high speed shooting. this website couldnt allow more inbetween photos, but the relevant shots are there. u can figure it out.
content.summary: Im a phtographer and i was photographing an american kestrel, well when i was reviewing the photos the object appeared and disappeared in the same position within 14 frames.

content.detailedDescription:
First off, many, many thanks for your immense undertaking of co-ordinating and publishing the seemingly exponential increase (?) in sightings... we are in seriously short supply of support groups here! it seems there are still too many people afraid to speak up! 
following the report i submitted in april 2014 (see case 55806) -
as i am an outdoor person, i spend most nights photographing the skies and, when crisp and clear i have the telescope set up. 
on 3 december at 11h05 i observed peripheral movement in the sky. i would like to think i am fairly familiar with what looks "normal"... and this was unequivocally the most exciting "craft" i have seen!
however, i cannot be sure whether it was "ours" or "theirs". 
conditions - partly cloudy (more of a general haze which seemed to lift periodically showing a beautifully crisp clear sky). it was at one of these clear-sky-points that i observed three star-like lights, moving in perfect unison - the 3 "stars" were perfectly equidistant and in a perfect straight line. i would guess around 70 degrees above the eastern horizon moving from the north-east straight across the sky towards south-east - disappearing behind a hazy cloud. the lights were white and didn't blink. it just glided over - a smooth effortless constant motion.
the clincher however, was that it originated from orion - more specifically from the 3 visible "sword stars" - and more astonishingly, it appeared to be the "sword's" exact replica! i couldn't even begin to guess the size, the speed, or the altitude. it made absolutely no sound. 
despite my excitement, i felt an indescribable anxiety and i physically buckled at the knees. more interestingly though, i was transfixed and unable to move - for quite some time after it had disappeared behind the haze...
in the last few months i have noted a kind of "shift" or wobble in the skies at night. i'm not too sure how to describe this - not even "in crayons". almost as if the stars, constellations, even the moon seem to appear nightly on the horizon either too far north or too far south. 
furthermore, there has been a sudden appearance of bizarrely beautiful clouds (day and night) i am completely unfamiliar with. many other utterly incomprehensible happenings and years of research have only resulted in more questions (a challenge :-)
that said, two of "our locals" , michael tellinger and baba credo mutwa have struck a significant chord within - almost as if their words resonate within me as the truth or even old memories... sadly, i feel that too few of mr. mutwa's words are heard...
content.summary: Linear object originating from the sword of orion

content.detailedDescription:
I originally posted my sighting on another ufo website at the time (september 2009). until now, i wasn't aware of the mufon website but thought it would be good to post my sighting here too.

this is what i originally wrote:

"hi. i saw something unexplainable over treherbert on tuesday 15th september 2009 at around 10pm. from my flat in treherbert, i can see the north star and on this particular night could also see the space telescope (in the direction of treherbert railway station). from the same point at the north star, a bright object was moving in the sky up the valley (as if you were looking down bute street). it was moving steadily and very smoothly. i am 100% sure it was not a helicopter or plane as it dipped in the sky (quite slowly) several times, still very smooth. i rushed to get my phone to video it, by this time the object moved quite quickly towards ‘the basin’ on the other side of the railway, hovered over the mountain, flashed brightly and then disappeared. i am convinced it was a ufo."

at the time, it was common knowledge that a space telescope was visible to the human eye and if i recall correctly, this was my reason for having a 'glance' out of the window at the time. this object caught my eye because it was brighter than anything else in the sky at the time.

again, i'm still to this day convinced it was a ufo as it moved in different directions. there were no flashing lights on the object like you would see on a plane or helicopter. not sure whether this is coincidence, but the moment i found my phone and went to film the object, it vanished (faded).

i can't go into anymore detail apart from what i originally wrote and don't want to add things that aren't true. i just though it might be useful to have a log - this is some 5 years ago.
content.summary: Convinced this was of extraterrestrial origin.

content.detailedDescription: The reason i am writing to contact you is that more events took place over the next 6-9 months , after the 1st sighting  i am seeking to tell my stories ( plural ) to a professional. the events that took place with me happened in 1983 and into 1984 and  are for a professional  investigator to hear. i want feedback and if same has happened to more people,   there are things that i will say that could be similar to other people.
content.summary: The energy orb was in room and next to my bed and was the size a a basketball and telepathy with . 2 other witnesses one outside and one was my girlfriend and was with me. outside witness knocked on front door approx. 1-2 minutes after event. at 3 am

content.detailedDescription: Ironically the lights inside are green like you would see in an alien ship on a sci-fi movie. the reason why you con't turn them off is because they don't run on electricity or any other type of power source. they run on carbon dioxide, you can't turn them off unless you remove all carbon dioxide (which would be a real mistake) but they can be made blue. we apparently don't have a word that translates to what they call it, however the owner of it said that since we call some thing that would carry people through space a spaceship, that we should just call that a space yacht.
content.summary: You wanted me to say one more thing

content.detailedDescription:
This photo sent to me from my nephew who was on a business trip to dallas,tx

no object was noticed while taking the photo - he was just shooting random shots of the large buildings. 

note:  i cropped the ufo out of the original picture but have sent you both.
content.summary: Ufo shows up in random sightseeing photo when on business trip.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at home standing on the balcony of my condo facing east.
2. it was a completely clear night and i saw the movement of the object that cause me to focus on it.
3. i at first thought it was a searchlight but then noticed it was a distinct triangular shape.
4. i just came from the west straight over my head towards the east, it was moving at a high rate of speed in a straight line.
5. i was left speechless and confused as to what i just saw.
6. i lost sight because it just became too far to see.
content.summary: It was just a fast moving distinct triangular shape

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were going home west) on route 50/cortez blvd, spring hill, florida as we crossed u.S highway 19 we saw a triangle craft that had two bright white lights flashing on and off. they were bright with a red light in the middle. the craft was traveling southeast. it was flying way to slow to be an airplane .  it shot out/dropped a smaller blueish/greenish ball of light (perhaps a smaller craft) but no shape could be seen on that, just it's light. it was much smaller) the ball of light slowly went into the weeki wachee preserve. it fell like a shooting star but slower . the triangle craft then turned east.  we pulled over to the closest street (steuben street)and got out of the car and watched the slow moving triangle craft go back (north)u.S.19 . it then went behind the tree's that run north on u.S.19 and cortez blvd and we could no longer see what it was doing from our vantage point. this actually happened just two weeks ago on the other end of the street. on osowaw blvd and shoal line dr.. same identical thing happen a craft shot the same color ball of light out of it. we pulled over then. i was with my niece and two nephews and fiancé. this time though it was closer and easier to see it's triangle formation. i did not have a camera on me. now i have one that never leaves the car .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle ufo shoots out a smaller blue/green light or craft into weekiwachee neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: Object in the sky at first appeared like a plane with light brightness as if the lights were pointed directly at me. it hovered in place for a moment, lights wavering, and began to slowly head in a southerly direction. with no discernible stop it began to move in the opposite direction, until a house obscured it from my view. moments later it returned and headed south again, once again hovering, moving south, then north. it did this three times, on the third it passed directly in my line of sight with a plane, which was headed the opposite way descending towards a final run to the airport. the movement of the object was far slower than that of the plane, and the lights were much brighter. it then hovered in place, and began to move east, until it dimmed out of view. entire event happened over about 20 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multi coloured multi directional light flew over northeastern toronto sky

content.detailedDescription: i saw a ufo this evening riding (with my brother) on 121 headed out of gainesville near the monteocha conservation area. it was a large disc or cigar shaped object consisting of 4 lights that we could see blinking at different times and it was just hovering slowly at an angle above the road about a half mile to a mile away from our car. it was way bigger than a airplane and slowly moving at a funny angle. it made me yell when i saw it ,i said "@#$% h what the @#$% is that thing?" he goes "is that a plane?...No... what the @#$% is that?" then it slowly moved beyond the tree line where we couldn't see it and so we kept driving hoping that the tree line would drop off to where we could see it again, and of course its all just high pines for a few miles, but then we busted out of the trees on 231 before you get to 142 ave, and there it was!!! but this time it was(5-10?) miles away and we just caught a brief glimpse of it before again, it disappeared into the tree line. we said @#$% it and pulled over and got out of the car in the open field and searched the treeline, but it was gone after that one last glimpse. was it aliens? who the @#$% knows what it was, but it was doing its blinky thing up there... and for sure 2 pretty rational, stone sober people saw the same thing. i imagine i may get a little @#$% for this but i @#$% saw it and so did he. what it was will remain a mystery.
content.summary: I am a pretty skeptical person and i cant tell you for sure what i saw. strange @#$% is afoot at the circle k.

content.detailedDescription: Can you explain this pictures, i was in st petesberg fl in the bridge at 4:00 pm
content.summary: In the ocean

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my house with my mom near dark on the 4th of july. we noticed far in the distance a very bright red orangish light heading our direction. the light had a look to a firework exploding so there was no initial reaction. the light then became 3 lights as it got closer and we could see better. there was one light in the front and 2 in the back. all circular shaped very large redish orange lights that formed a triangle and were clearly apart of the same object as it silently came closer as we watched it come closer and closer until the cover of our roof hid the object. i looked back out the window and saw 2 more of these triangle crafts coming. i went outside for a better look at the other 2. they were 2 seperate crafts than the first but looked the same. huge triangles about the size of a commercial jet high up in the sky but a little lower than a jet. there were no blinking lights anywhere on all 3 of them. as my mom and i watched i didnt even think to take pics or videos as i have seen so many planes etc in the sky but nothing remotely close to this and sort of stood there staring at it trying to make logical reason of them until they had flown past which took about 3 to 5 minutes. they made no noise at all. after thinking about things they could have been i cant think of a single logical thing it can potentially be. i really wish i had not been so in awe of what i had seen and taken video. of all days it had to be on the 4th of july so people immediately think fireworks but theres a big difference between fireworks and 3 huge triangle crafts at high altitude with lights like u have never seen before and on a flight path that no local airports have planes approach on. i searched on internetfor triangle ufos and they looked
much like what was seen in belgium. there was no light in center of ufo as some see though
content.summary: 3 large very bright triangle ufos traveling same flight path a half mile apart

content.detailedDescription: Round sphere with lights in it
content.summary: Round sphere with lights in it

content.detailedDescription: Watching tv notice falling orb out window clear sky about three seconds angle toward earth aqua blue color round ? explode and diminish
content.summary: Falling orb flash exploding aqua blue with trail

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:10 pm 0n wednesday december third 2014 i saw about a half mile wide triangle with three blinking lights that lasted about five minutes before disapearing behind trees in the distance. earlier today i also witnessed what appeared to be an unmanned arial vehicle that i've also never seen before, this is the second time i have observed strange phenomena in the night sky over my house and i feel i must stress that what i saw was not an airplane, helicopter or any other typical craft in the sky.
content.summary: It was a big triangle unlike anything i've seen before.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling northbound on the suncoast expressway in hernando county, florida around 4:45am on my way to work. the road was pitch black and the sky had somewhat of a fog temperature was 65, there was also driver to my right and the speed limit is 70mph. the expressway has no lights unless you head southbound and get closer to the city of tampa. with-in a split second around 4:45am the dark sky lit up bright white and seemed to be 2-3 triangular objects in the northwest sky and the northeast sky hovering down very slowly, i quickly grabbed my phone to get a picture thinking its some type of military aircraft or spot lights. i began to slow from 70mph down to 40 mph the lights quickly dimmed down to a dark yellow and they slowly rotated counter clockwise. then all at once the triangular objects shot straight up turning the lit sky back to black all within 20 seconds. the vehicle to my right braked quickly and ended up pulling over. 

there is also an airport about 10mins northwest which only has small proper planes and small corporate jets that take off very rarely, there is also a military building attached to the airport which the army and coast guard fly a helicopter and a large us coast guard aircraft during the day.

i do not believe in aliens and i do think it is very possible the military could develop experimental aircraft.. i did not report this to police and some people think it looks like street lights
content.summary: 2-3 large triangular shapes hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the beach in st.Augustine, fl at around midnight and got drawn to a particularly bright star that i believed to be jupiter. the light suddenly got very bright and seemed to be hurtling toward earth. my witness and i got very startled and were overcome with fear as it got closer and seemed to moved both vertically up and down and side to side. we could make out a dark disc shape emitting the bright light and realized this was a ufo that seemed to be struggling in the sky as if it were going to crash. we started walking to our car and it moved across the sky to the left. we stopped two others on the beach and ask if they saw it move and they did. we watched the ufo struggle for an hour- lighting up the clouds every so often with a massive light until we noticed 6 other lights that looked further appeared around the ufo as if other smaller ones came to help it. at this time my witnesses and i observed two military planes fly by as well. the 7 ufos moved into a formation and completely flew out of the atmosphere. an hour observation over all.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Observed from beach. ufo appeared as star at first but then came extremely close, almost crashed into ocean. struggled in sky moving erratically for an hour- then left atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: I work in home health care. i was at work at my clients home on the overnight shift on the morning of nov. 21 2014. i stepped outside on the front porch of the house, which faces west, to smoke a cigarette. i looked up into the sky and noticed what i first thought was a helicopter light as there is a hospital nearby and low flying helicopters are not unusual in the area. i then realized that there were no running lights (red and green) and no landing lights. the color of the light was yellow/orange and was not a color that i had ever seen on aircraft. as i watched what looked like a fireball, it moved in an apparent straight line in a northeastern course, moving from left to right. after watching it for several seconds it ascended up into the low cloud cover and disappeared. when i was a younger man, i was in the us navy and was trained as a lookout on board ship. i have experience sighting, following, and identifying multiple aircraft, course, etc. this fireball made no sound that i could hear and was of no color/configuration i have ever seen.
content.summary: Sighted what looked like a fireball in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my morning walk before dawn on kilohana street in kailua kona, hi.
conditions-70 degrees, dark, no clouds, 5:30 am hst, sky filled with stars.
observed a yellow star in the sw sky, altitude-approx 3000' above sea level.
observed it slowly pacing me. i shined a 1300 lumen flashlight on it in the quick strobe mode. it jerked, got brighter, and "here it comes!" condition of observer--very frightened. when it got right above me, at an estimated 250-500', i flashed my strobe on in again, and it stopped. it's light closed for 1.5-2 seconds. it appeared to be a brushed stainless steel or aluminum ball, best guess 15-20 in diameter. it's yellow light resumed, and it took off at a tremendous speed, crossing the entire horizon to the north in 1 second before disappearing. time of observation- 8 seconds. observer description-55 yr old male cauc. i wear corrective lenses. profession--eye witness identification expert--licensed private investigator, 32 years. no history of making unconservative or false statements. no-mental illness, drug abuse, hallucinations. medical condition--i take a statin for high cholesterol. opinion--i accept the idea there could be ufos but don't believe anything until i can examine it. i can say what it wasn't--not a balloon, a bird, an insect, a drone, an airplane or helicopter. my immediate impression--there goes my understanding of our world. the object exhibited intelligent control, operated beyond our technology of flight, was silent. i am not making an accurate determination as to distances, size, and speed, but only approximations. best guess--it was a solid obect. it behaved outside our current understanding of physics and propulsion. it (could have been) a probe, a spacecraft, military secret, alive. my impression--that it's message was--"this is who i am, and this is what i can do."
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Yellow star, pointed 1300 lumen strobe at it, and here it comes.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 7.30 pm. monday the 6th oct.14, i went to lock the sliding glass door which faces southeast. i noticed several amber lights low on the sky. 
i had not seen lights like this before, so i took my camera off the kitchen table and tried to take photo's of the lights. the camera's flash was on so it illuminated the trees and was able to focus and take pictures. i took 4 pictures. because it was dark, i wasn't sure the pictures would come out. as i took the last picture the lights all disappeared. when i took the pictures off my camera's sd card, i could see they all came out ok. the last picture i took was from my back deck which allowed me to shoot the picture above some tall bushes in the back yard.
content.summary: Went, to lock sliding glass door, seen several amber colored lights in sky, got nkon d5000 camera and took 4 pics, then lights disappeared.
